abstract: Jake Ballard has been more than simply a blocking tight end for the Giants this season.
snippet: Jake Ballard has been more than simply a blocking tight end for the Giants this season.
lead_paragraph: Brandon Jacobs went up to the Giants' new tight end, Jake Ballard, on the sideline two weeks ago, seeking him out to offer a confession.

headline.main: Is Giants' Ballard Owed an Apology?
